body: Nana argues that military option should be last in Cote d'Ivoire: "I thought that both Ouatarra and Gbagbo may have cheated in the November 28 election. My qualms was why France, the USA and the IMF were at only Gbagbo's neck; even to the point that a sitting president of one country (France) had the audacity to instruct another president to leave office."
original_body: Nana argues that military option should be last in Cote d'Ivoire: "I thought that both Ouatarra and Gbagbo may have cheated in the November 28 election. My qualms was why France, the USA and the IMF were at only Gbagbo's neck; even to the point that a sitting president of one country (France) had the audacity to instruct another president to leave office."
title: Cote d'Ivoire: Military option should be last
